name: Nephilim Saga
description:
Arm yourself and take part in the war that will decide the fate of humanity!

Key Features:
*Experience an intense atmosphere of war in a post-apocalyptic FPS.

*Fight brutal creatures and deadly monsters.

*Test your survival skills by exploring vast areas without getting lost, with the help of the objects you have at your disposal.

*Solve puzzles that will bring you closer to finding an old legend that slowly but surely comes to life.
